item.title: Connection
item.description:
Hold my hand
I’m real powerless to fight
Can you lead me to the light?
My strenght has come to fear
Fled in truth of dawn
Curious as a day
My heart huh woah oh

Can you bring me back to life?
Ignite the fire again?
Can you bring me back home where I am not alone?
I’m lost inside, the night and I cannot find you
Bring me back

item.title: Alone
item.description:
I‚Äôm so alone, nothing feels like home.
I‚Äôm so alone, try to find my way back home to you.

item.title: Reply in Slowly
item.description:
I also feel lonely last week, but I walked out recently.
I‚Äôm sorry to hear that you didn‚Äôt live with your parents üôÅ
I think maybe it‚Äôs the reason you still struggling against loneliness.
In the book ‚ÄòBecoming human‚Äô, belonging is very important, we need belongings.
I‚Äôm so sorry my language is not very well? but I‚Äôm willing to hear your stories, through words, I hope we can build a good friendship ?

item.title: Free is tough
item.description:
Today I browsed many articles about free software, especially this article, Stallman is sort of extreme, why I always care about extremely security and privacy too?

I‚Äôm not an extreme person in any topic, I need to have my life and my own goal, but because of my personality, I stick to some thinking that makes me different from others, in the end, it doesn‚Äôt make me very happy.

My dreams(like become a native speaker or improve my skill and knowledge reserve very fast) are building in the air, not in the reality, why I cannot enjoy the road?
